page.title: 18QUESTIONNAIRE CONTINUED
page.content: have 2 or more TV sets. Most parents are quite pleased with State education but feel that money should be spent to provide more teachers,better kept buildings & more resources.Discipline should also be improved. 75% said that everyone of working age in the family has a job but 44% claimed to have suffered some redundancy.The majority blame Government policy & technological developements for unemployment. Most families have 1 car & the most popular means of travel to work is the car followed by the bus,train & bicycle.Just over 50% commute to work with 57% of those working in Liverpool.
